Entries.Header: Anders Enger Jensen and Peter Katz
Entries.Text: Providing us with an excellent soundtrack all for the low price of free - making our goal possible.

Entries.Header: Every member of the community who's stuck around since day one
Entries.Text: For motivating us to keep going, and sticking by us no matter what happens
For penetration-testing us and giving us very useful information about ways we can patch some major security holes in the Watercolor website and Peacenet multiplayer system
For being absolute champs and making sure that our game is automatically recognized by the Rich Presence API when you boot it
Providing us with free hosting and a domain name for our website and game server
For giving our game a try. We hope you liked it :)
